Class EnquiryRepository

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.repository.EnquiryRepository
public class EnquiryRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing Enquiry entities. Handles loading, saving, adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving enquiries.
